  • Method Details

    • setPort

      public void setPort​(int port) throws IllegalPortException
      set and verifies the port
      Parameters:
      port - to be set, port > 1024 && port < 65535
      Throws:
      IllegalPortException - thrown if port given is invalid

    • setAddress

      public void setAddress​(java.lang.String address) throws IllegalAddressException
      set and verifies the address
      Parameters:
      address - to be set. It must be a valid IP or a valid link
      Throws:
      IllegalAddressException - thrown if address given is invalid

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname​(java.lang.String nickname) throws IllegalNicknameException
      set and verifies nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - to be set. nickname.length() > 1 && nickname.length() < 30
      Throws:
      IllegalNicknameException - thrown if nickname is invalid
